ValidationRule.description: Makes Reason Rescinded Required when an opportunity is saved with "Rescinded"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Rescinded__c,""), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HNBF_Opportunity_Record_Type', ISPICKVAL(StageName ,"Rescinded"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reason Rescinded is required when the opportunity is Rescinded.
